title: Blood Beginnings
description: A day after Eamon Rutherford destroys a cadre of vampire hunters sent to kill him, he decides to take his human lover Amelie to London to turn her into a vampire and locate Bernard Townsend, the vampire who has declared a blood war on Eamon. Bernard plans to reveal vampires to humans and dominate the world. He knows this will never happen as long as Eamon is alive. To defeat Eamon, Bernard turns to his secret offspring Reinhard Heydrich, the Butcher of Prague, to kidnap and kill Eamon's beloved Amelie. Eamon must find and save Amelie before Reinhard kills her and Berhard's plan unfolds. But saving Amelie won't be easy, for at every turn Eamon finds intrigue and deception, even from those he trusts the most.
author: Alison Beightol
